General.Name: Entourage Health Corp
General.Description: Entourage Health Corp. engages in the production and distribution of cannabis products for medical and adult-use markets in Canada. It offers cannabis plants, dried flower, pre-rolls, soft chews, chewing gum, cannabis oils, capsules, topicals and vapes, extracts, and edibles. The company sells its products under the Color Cannabis, Saturday Cannabis, Starseed Medicinal, Syndicate Cannabis, Mary's Medicinals, and Irwin Naturals brand names. The company was formerly known as WeedMD Inc. and changed its name to Entourage Health Corp. in July 2021. Entourage Health Corp. is headquartered in Aylmer, Canada.
General.Address: 276 Queen Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5V 2A1
